function.name: equals
function.description: Compares two Strings, returning true if they are equal.

function.name: indexOf
function.description: Finds the first index within a String, handling null.

function.name: length
function.description: Gets a String's length or 0 if the String is null.

function.name: isEmpty
function.description: Checks if a String is empty ("") or null.

function.name: equalsIgnoreCase
function.description: Compares two Strings, returning true if they are equal ignoring the case.

function.name: startsWith
function.description: Check if a String starts with a specified prefix.

function.name: endsWith
function.description: Case insensitive check if a String ends with a specified suffix.

function.name: lastIndexOf
function.description: Finds the last index within a String, handling null.

function.name: replace
function.description: Replaces all occurrences of a String within another String.

function.name: contains
function.description: Checks if String contains a search String, handling null.

function.name: split
function.description: Splits the provided text into an array, using whitespace as the separator.

function.name: trim
function.description: Removes control characters (char <= 32) from both ends of this String, handling null by returning null.

function.name: remove
function.description: Removes all occurrences of a substring from within the source string.

function.name: reverse
function.description: Reverses the string builder placing each character in the opposite index.

function.name: isWhitespace
function.description: Checks if the String contains only whitespace.

function.name: clean
function.description: Deprecated. Use trimToEmpty

function.name: escape
function.description: Deprecated. Use StringEscapeUtils.escapeJava(String)

function.name: isAlpha
function.description: Checks if the String contains only unicode letters.

function.name: left
function.description: Gets the leftmost characters of a String.

function.name: right
function.description: Gets the rightmost characters of a String.

function.name: difference
function.description: Compares two Strings, and returns the portion where they differ.

function.name: repeat
function.description: Repeat a String repeat times to form a new String.

function.name: startsWithIgnoreCase
function.description: Case insensitive check if a String starts with a specified prefix.

function.name: endsWithIgnoreCase
function.description: Case insensitive check if a String ends with a specified suffix.

function.name: capitalize
function.description: Capitalizes a String changing the first letter to title case.

function.name: uncapitalize
function.description: Uncapitalizes a String changing the first letter to title case.

function.name: containsAny
function.description: Checks if the String contains any character in the given set of characters.

function.name: isNotBlank
function.description: Checks if a String is not empty (""), not null and not whitespace only.

function.name: isBlank
function.description: Checks if a String is whitespace, empty ("") or null.

function.name: isNotEmpty
function.description: Checks if a String is not empty ("") and not null.

function.name: trimToNull
function.description: Removes control characters (char <= 32) from both ends of this String returning null if the String is empty ("") after the trim or if it is null.

function.name: trimToEmpty
function.description: Removes control characters (char <= 32) from both ends of this String returning an empty String ("") if the String is empty ("") after the trim or if it is null.

function.name: strip
function.description: Strips whitespace from the start and end of a String.

function.name: stripToNull
function.description: Strips whitespace from the start and end of a String returning null if the String is empty ("") after the strip.

function.name: stripToEmpty
function.description: Strips whitespace from the start and end of a String returning an empty String if null input.

function.name: stripStart
function.description: Strips any of a set of characters from the start of a String.

function.name: stripEnd
function.description: Strips any of a set of characters from the end of a String.

function.name: ordinalIndexOf
function.description: Finds the n-th index within a String, handling null.

function.name: containsIgnoreCase
function.description: Checks if String contains a search String irrespective of case, handling null.

function.name: indexOfAny
function.description: Search a String to find the first index of any character in the given set of characters.

function.name: indexOfAnyBut
function.description: Search a String to find the first index of any character not in the given set of characters.

function.name: containsOnly
function.description: Checks if the String contains only certain characters.

function.name: containsNone
function.description: Checks that the String does not contain certain characters.

function.name: mid
function.description: Gets characters from the middle of a String.

function.name: substringBefore
function.description: Gets the substring before the first occurrence of a separator.

function.name: substringAfter
function.description: Gets the substring after the first occurrence of a separator.

function.name: substringBeforeLast
function.description: Gets the substring before the last occurrence of a separator.

function.name: substringAfterLast
function.description: Gets the substring after the last occurrence of a separator.

function.name: substringBetween
function.description: Gets the String that is nested in between two instances of the same String.

function.name: substringsBetween
function.description: Searches a String for substrings delimited by a start and end tag, returning all matching substrings in an array.

function.name: getNestedString
function.description: Deprecated. Use the better named substringBetween

function.name: splitByWholeSeparator
function.description: Splits the provided text into an array, separator string specified.

function.name: splitByWholeSeparatorPreserveAllTokens
function.description: Splits the provided text into an array, separator string specified.

function.name: splitPreserveAllTokens
function.description: Splits the provided text into an array, using whitespace as the separator, preserving all tokens, including empty tokens created by adjacent separators.

function.name: splitByCharacterType
function.description: Splits a String by Character type as returned by java.lang.Character.getType(char).

function.name: splitByCharacterTypeCamelCase
function.description: Splits a String by Character type as returned by java.lang.Character.getType(char).

function.name: deleteSpaces
function.description: Deprecated. Use the better localized deleteWhitespace

function.name: deleteWhitespace
function.description: Deletes all whitespaces from a String as defined by Character.isWhitespace(char).

function.name: removeStart
function.description: Removes a substring only if it is at the begining of a source string, otherwise returns the source string.

function.name: removeStartIgnoreCase
function.description: Case insensitive removal of a substring if it is at the begining of a source string, otherwise returns the source string.

function.name: removeEnd
function.description: Removes a substring only if it is at the end of a source string, otherwise returns the source string.

function.name: removeEndIgnoreCase
function.description: Case insensitive removal of a substring if it is at the end of a source string, otherwise returns the source string.

function.name: replaceOnce
function.description: Replaces a String with another String inside a larger String, once.

function.name: replaceChars
function.description: Replaces multiple characters in a String in one go.

function.name: overlayString
function.description: Deprecated. Use better named overlay.

function.name: overlay
function.description: Overlays part of a String with another String.

function.name: chop
function.description: Remove the last character from a String.

function.name: chopNewline
function.description: Deprecated. Use chomp instead.

function.name: rightPad
function.description: Right pad a String with a specified String.

function.name: leftPad
function.description: Left pad a String with a specified String.

function.name: center
function.description: Centers a String in a larger String of int size.

function.name: upperCase
function.description: Converts a String to upper case.

function.name: lowerCase
function.description: Converts a String to lower case.

function.name: capitalise
function.description: Deprecated. Use the standardly named capitalize.

function.name: uncapitalise
function.description: Deprecated. Use the standardly named uncapitalize.

function.name: swapCase
function.description: Swaps the case of a String changing upper and title case to lower case, and lower case to upper case.

function.name: capitaliseAllWords
function.description: Deprecated. Use the relocated WordUtils.capitalize(String).

function.name: countMatches
function.description: Counts how many times the substring appears in the larger String.

function.name: isAlphaSpace
function.description: Checks if the String contains only unicode letters and space (' ').

function.name: isAlphanumeric
function.description: Checks if the String contains only unicode letters or digits.

function.name: isAlphanumericSpace
function.description: Checks if the String contains only unicode letters, digits or space (' ').

function.name: isAsciiPrintable
function.description: Checks if the string contains only ASCII printable characters.

function.name: isNumeric
function.description: Checks if the String contains only unicode digits.

function.name: isNumericSpace
function.description: Checks if the String contains only unicode digits or space (' ').

function.name: defaultString
function.description: Returns either the passed in String, or if the String is null, the value of default String.

function.name: defaultIfEmpty
function.description: Returns either the passed in String, or if the String is empty or null, the value of default String.

function.name: reverseDelimited
function.description: Reverses a String that is delimited by a specific character.

function.name: reverseDelimitedString
function.description: Deprecated. Use reverseDelimited(String, char) instead.

function.name: abbreviate
function.description: Abbreviates a String to the length passed, replacing the middle characters with the supplied replacement String.

function.name: indexOfDifference
function.description: Compares two Strings, and returns the index at which the Strings begin to differ.
